property.name: text
property.value: This model demonstrates the DDF and FSM domains inside the SDF domain.

property.name: text
property.value: Author: Christopher Brooks, based on Gang Zhou's PtII demo and a Ptolemy Classic demo.

entity.name: Uniform

entity.name: Ramp

property.name: text
property.value: The requiredFiringsPerIteration parameter for this DDFBooleanSelect is set to 2, which defines one iteration of this inside DDF domain.

svg.text: This Modal Model changes states each time there is an input on the control port.
